mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (review_title, review_content, review_category, review_grade, group_id) values(#{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewCategory}, #{reviewGrade}, #{groupId})
mapper.select: select review_id, review_title, review_content, review_category, review_register_date, review_update_date, review_grade, group_id from tbl_review
